title: The Cliff’s Edge
description: In this Dateline classic, a romantic night out goes terribly wrong when Jody Scharf falls from the edge of a cliff. But was it an accident -- or was she pushed? Chris Jansing reports. Originally aired on NBC on August 12, 2011.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
